name: GetCampaignRevenueReport
description:
Fetch revenue attribution report for a specific campaign.

This tool retrieves the revenue attribution report data for a specified marketing campaign using its unique campaign GUID.

parameters.name: campaign_unique_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the campaign, formatted as a UUID.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier for the campaign, formatted as a UUID.

parameters.name: attribution_model
parameters.description: The revenue attribution model to be used. Allowed values: LINEAR, FIRST_INTERACTION, LAST_INTERACTION, FULL_PATH, U_SHAPED, W_SHAPED, TIME_DECAY, J_SHAPED, INVERSE_J_SHAPED. Defaults to LINEAR.

value_schema.description:
Allowed values: LINEAR, FIRST_INTERACTION, LAST_INTERACTION, FULL_PATH, U_SHAPED, W_SHAPED, TIME_DECAY, J_SHAPED, INVERSE_J_SHAPED
Default value: LINEAR

parameters.name: report_start_date
parameters.description: The start date for the report data in the format YYYY-MM-DD. Default is 2006-01-01.

value_schema.description:
The start date for the report data, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.
Default value: 2006-01-01

parameters.name: report_end_date
parameters.description: End date for the report data in YYYY-MM-DD format. Defaults to the current date.

value_schema.description:
End date for the report data, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.
Default value: Current date

metadata.description: Arcade Starter tools for LLMs to interact directly with the low-level Hubspot Marketing API

parameters.name: attributionModel
parameters.description:
Allowed values: LINEAR, FIRST_INTERACTION, LAST_INTERACTION, FULL_PATH, U_SHAPED, W_SHAPED, TIME_DECAY, J_SHAPED, INVERSE_J_SHAPED
Default value: LINEAR

value_schema.description:
Allowed values: LINEAR, FIRST_INTERACTION, LAST_INTERACTION, FULL_PATH, U_SHAPED, W_SHAPED, TIME_DECAY, J_SHAPED, INVERSE_J_SHAPED
Default value: LINEAR

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
The start date for the report data, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.
Default value: 2006-01-01

value_schema.description:
The start date for the report data, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.
Default value: 2006-01-01

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
End date for the report data, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.
Default value: Current date

value_schema.description:
End date for the report data, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.
Default value: Current date

parameters.name: campaignGuid
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the campaign, formatted as a UUID.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier for the campaign, formatted as a UUID.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
